summary: Comprehensive testing of Category Page Sidebar Filters and Saved Filters feature. All features working correctly - SUBCATEGORIES, FILTERS (Condition checkboxes, Price Range, Sort By), and SAVED FILTERS section all render properly. Search autocomplete with suggestions dropdown is working. Previous iteration issues resolved.

issues: Console warnings: 'Unexpected text node' appearing multiple times - minor React Native web rendering issue, does not affect functionality

context_for_next_testing_agent: All category page sidebar features working. Auth token key fixed to 'session_token'. Saved filters feature fully functional for authenticated users.

sidebar_subcategories.items: PASS - All subcategories listed (e.g., All Electronics, Laptops & Computers, etc.)

sidebar_filters.condition_checkboxes: PASS - New, Like New, Good, Fair checkboxes visible
sidebar_filters.price_range: PASS - Min/Max inputs and Apply button visible
sidebar_filters.sort_by: PASS - Newest First, Price: Low to High, Price: High to Low radio buttons visible

saved_filters_unauthenticated.sign_in_message: PASS - 'Sign in to save filters' message displayed

saved_filters_authenticated.no_saved_message: PASS - 'No saved filters yet' message when no filters saved
saved_filters_authenticated.save_button: PASS - 'Save Current Filters' button appears when filters applied
saved_filters_authenticated.save_modal: PASS - Save Filter Preset modal opens with name input

search_autocomplete.popular_searches_dropdown: PASS - Popular/Trending searches dropdown appears when search focused
search_autocomplete.suggestions_dropdown: PASS - Suggestions dropdown appears when typing (2+ chars)

auth_token_key_issue.fix: Changed 'authToken' to 'session_token' in category page localStorage access

autocomplete_dropdown_issue.status: Dropdown now appearing correctly when typing in search

saved_filters_visibility_issue.status: SAVED FILTERS section now visible for both authenticated and unauthenticated users
